error.midaz.invalidCountryCode: The provided country code does not conform to the ISO-3166 alpha-2 standard. Please provide a valid alpha-2 country code.
error.midaz.missingFields: Your request is missing one or more required fields. Please refer to the documentation to verify the necessary fields for your request.
error.midaz.unknowError: Error on Midaz. Please contact support.
error.midaz.actionNotPermitted: The action you are attempting is not allowed in the current environment. Please consult the documentation for guidance on how to proceed.
error.midaz.entityNotFound: No entity was found matching the provided ID. Ensure the correct ID is being used for the entity you are attempting to manage.
error.midaz.ledgerNameConflict: A ledger named already exists in your organization. Please rename the ledger, or if you want to use the same name, consider creating a new ledger for a different division.
error.midaz.codeUpperCaseRequirement: The code must be in uppercase. Please ensure that the code is in uppercase format and try again.
error.midaz.currencyCodeStandardComplian: Currency-type assets must comply with the ISO-4217 standard. Please use a currency code that conforms to ISO-4217 guidelines.
error.midaz.invalidCodeFormat: The 'code' field must be alphanumeric, in upper case, and must contain at least one letter. Please provide a valid code.
error.midaz.invalidType: The provided 'type' is not valid. Accepted types are currency, crypto, commodities, or others. Please provide a valid type.
error.midaz.assetNameOrCodeDuplicate: An asset with the same name or code already exists in your ledger. Please modify the name or code of your new asset.
error.midaz.invalidScriptError: The script provided in your request is invalid or in an unsupported format. Please verify the script format and try again.
